title: NO LEAVERBUSTER ON BOTS PLZ
body: we should have a way to test our games to see if they work right how is it that my game works perfect for 6 matches no problem but it disconnects me when i get the leaverbuster off i have to wait 20 mins bc the GAME disconnects me my pc and internet are fine if i had a problem it would have done it every time  and my internet is high speed plugged in never had any problems with it before all i ask is to take that leaverbuster off bots so i can play and if i wana risk having to wait next time ill go pvp not bc my c but bc of this game its pissing me off bc i just got done with a 20 min leaverbuster ........NO LEAVERBUSTER ON BOTS

replies.body: You can run a test by creating a custom game, and add bots of your own if you like.  As long as there aren't any other players, you won't be penalized by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)!  In regards to the disconnections, it does sound like your network is having issues maintaining comms to the game server.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to help fix this up.  Hope that helps!
